events.message: I placed an order over two weeks ago, but my package still hasn't arrived and the tracking status hasn't updated for days.
System has categorized the reported problem as a delivery delay based on the customer's description of a late shipment.
The case has been assigned to the delivery support team to investigate the delayed package and provide assistance.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. Iâ€™m here to help you with your delayed order issue.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can check the latest tracking details for you?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the shipping address is 45 Main Street, Springfield.
I checked the tracking and found the shipment is delayed due to a transit issue. We expect it to arrive within the next three business days. We will monitor it closely.
Thanks for the update. I appreciate you looking into it and letting me know the expected delivery window.
Your package has been delivered today. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We are following up to ensure that you received your order in good condition and the delay did not cause significant inconvenience.
Since you have confirmed receipt and no further issues have been reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience.
